tweet: The Cardano roadmap has been updated. Check out new items, updated progress and the new layout here:  https://t.co/uOThpgSdbj

The Cardano roadmap has been updated! Check out new items, updated progress and the new layout here:  https://t.co/LYr81Kdfjw

IOHK is pleased to announce a major brand refresh for #Cardano and reveal the new Gource visualisation in today's release of the roadmap update! Check out the details here on @cardanocom forum  https://t.co/28mizesvaJ and  https://t.co/YdscLz5K6Q. We look forward to your feedback.  https://t.co/XAyt3ZCO6x
